resources:
Hedera Wallet
Like a password, this recovery phrase is the only way to recover a Hedera Wallet. Save the recovery phrase to recover your Hedera Wallet if it is deleted, lost, or you get a new phone. It is recommended to also save your accountID along with these 24 words. Enter, in order, the 22 or 24 words you were given when you created your previous wallet account. You will be prompted to enter the account id in next step. Please enter the Account ID associated with the recovery phrase entered. The latest version of the Hedera Wallet requires your public / private key pair and recovery phrase for account ID %1$s be updated. Tap here to perform this update, and securely document your new information.
// Bip32 Migration Found below is your new recovery phrase. Please save it in a safe place (or places), where it won\'t be lost, and no one else will see it. Anyone who possesses this recovery phrase will have control over the account. We’ve updated the Hedera Wallet’s key generation mechanism to match industry standard encryption (BIP39).\n\nTap ‘Accept’ to update the public / private key pairs and recovery phrase associated with your existing Hedera account ID. (Recommended)\n\nTap ‘Skip’ to retain the public / private key pairs and recovery phrase associated with your existing Hedera account ID. You will eventually need ‘Accept’ this change in future Hedera Wallet application updates. After securely documenting your new recovery phrase, please enter your account ID in the field below and tap \'Confirm\'. The public / private key pair and recovery phrase for your Hedera account ID is being updated.\n\nThis may take a minute. Please do not quit this application or turn off your device during the update. It looks like something went wrong with the key update. I’m checking now whether the account currently has the new key or the old key. Thank you The private / public key pair and recovery phrase for account ID %1$s has been updated.\n\nThis account ID can now be recovered using your new recovery phrase, from both the Hedera Wallet and any other wallet or application which supports the BIP39 encryption standard. This will update your key pair and your recovery phrase.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Address copied to clipboard" Address copied to clipboard" Your account info is copied successfully" Recovery phrase copied to clipboard" Nodes copied to clipboard"
Cancel OK Yes No Decline Agree
Confirm fingerprint to continue Touch sensor Fingerprint not recognized. Try again Fingerprint recognized A new fingerprint was added to this device, so your password is required. Use fingerprint in the future Use fingerprint to authenticate use_fingerprint_to_authenticate_key Fingerprint icon

Ending in...4a19a7 REQUESTS ACCOUNTS SETTINGS Welcome Enter your PIN Invalid PIN, please try again Get Started on Hedera Account unverified 0.0.9 Signature Algorithms ED25519 EC384 Dismiss TextView 35.170.13.208:50211 OR NOTES 2 minute ago CHANGE ACCOUNT NAME PUBLIC KEY PRIVATE KEY HIDE DISPLAY Hedera Wallet Version 1.0 Build 1 ACCOUNT ID $ No Transactions FROM TO AMOUNT INITIAL AMOUNT FEE MAX FEE Account AutoRenew Period is 3 months
NOTE PROFILE Name NOTIFICATIONS VERIFY Max Fee Security

ExportKeyActivity Please connect to WIFI and try again Invalid QR-Code Failed to scan QR-Code TODO Coming soon name (optional) e.g. 0.0.12
PIN Place a QRcode inside the rectangle Warning Fetching records will cost you hbars. Do you want to proceed? You will be sending your transaction to a third party to submit on your behalf. Make sure to only use information provided by a trusted destination.
Exporting private keys allows full control of your Hedera account even taking all the hbars in it. Ensure you are only interacting with trusted partners and software.
Enable Fingerprint ID Enable PIN Change PIN Couldn\'t save default max fee. Please enter a valid amount for your Max Fee threshold.
You are about to perform a Master Reset on your wallet, this will remove all keys, accounts, and recovery words from this device, this will not change anything on the Network. Please save all your recovery words before this step. There were some issues while doing wallet reset. We recommend deleting the wallet and install it again. Proceed Error Refresh Unknown Last Bid Ask
Refreshing nodes will cost you hbars. Do you want to proceed?
